Articles.Title: Apple Vision Pro review one year later: time to exit the preview
Articles.Summary: It's been a wild year for Apple Vision Pro, if slow, and it's time for Apple to step up and prove it's the future. It is simultaneously a preview of the future and a stark reminder of Apple's struggl.

Articles.Title: M4 MacBook Air review roundup: Welcome upgrade, but no surprises
Articles.Summary: First hands-on reviews of the new MacBook Air with M4 processor have appeared. The previous model, the M3 MacBook Air was described by AppleInsider as the best Mac for most people.

Articles.Title: iPhone 16e review: All the bells, none of the whistles on this battery-heavy device
Articles.Summary: The iPhone 16e is a flagship device with the core iPhone experience at a lower price tag. Many users were hoping to see a new iPhone SE 4 in the spring of 2025.

Articles.Title: iPhone 16e vs iPhone 16: A new Apple Intelligence-powered entry-level option
Articles.Summary: The iPhone 16e has arrived as the new entry-level model for consumers. Arriving just shy of three years after the third-generation iPhone SE. Here's how it compares to yesterday's budget option.

Articles.Title: Pebble's new smartwatches take on Apple Watch with longer battery life
Articles.Summary: Pebble is making a comeback with the Core 2 Duo and the Core Time 2. Led by original Pebble founder Eric Migicovsky, these offerings provide an alternative to the Apple Watch.

Articles.Title: Rumored iOS 19 & macOS 16 design changes will be polarizing, as always
Articles.Summary: Apple is rumored to be overhauling the design of iOS 19 and macOS 16. The changes will polarize users before ultimately becoming accepted. This rumored redesign could even be enormous, and may follow previous claims that Apple will bring visionOS design touches to all of its platforms.

Articles.Title: AirPods 4 - four-month review: The best Apple earbuds for most people
Articles.Summary: The AirPods 4 come in a new, smaller case that you can take anywhere. While the AirPod Pro 2 and AirPOD Max still sit at the very top of Apple's audio accessory pyramid, they're known for their smaller size.

Articles.Title: iPhone 16e vs iPhone SE 3: A quantum leap forward
Articles.Summary: The iPhone 16e brings the iPhone SE kicking and screaming to modern times. Here's what's new about the spiritual successor versus the outgoing budget-friendly model. Apple has consistently kept the design of theiPhone SE behind the rest of the iPhone range.

Articles.Title: New M4 MacBook Air fixes the line's biggest problem
Articles.Summary: The new M4 MacBook Air fixes what's been a key problem with the line. It now supports up to two external monitors —  and does so without the limitations of the previous M3 edition.

Articles.Title: Apple Watch Series 10 three-month review: Iterative isn't a bad word
Articles.Summary: The Apple Watch Series 10 has been on my wrist for three months now. It's clear that it's the best smartwatch Apple ever made. But that doesn't mean there aren't things that a future Series 11 could do better.
